#labels CodingStyle,C,Formating
<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Naming =

 * All variables, classes, structures, etc, should name without abbreviations:

<table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 border=1>
<tbody>
<tr bgcolor="red"><td ><code>bool m_isUserCreated;</code></td><td><font color="green">*Correct*</font></td></tr>
<tr><td><code>bool m_usrCrtd;</code></td><td><font color="red">*Wrong*</font></td></tr>
</tbody>
</table>
 * Base types:

<table width="100%" cellspacing=0 border=1>
<thead><th>Name</th><th>Example</th></thead>
<tbody>
<tr><td>Namespace</td><td><code>namespace Gui {
    // Some code
} // namespace Gui</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>Class/Structure/Union</td><td><code>class Variable;
struct Rich;</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>Enum</td><td><code>enum Tool
{
        Line
    ,   Brush
};</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>Method/Function</td><td><code>void displayLine();</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>Local variable</td><td><code>int lineSize;</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>Static variable</td><td><code>int s_lineSize;</code> or <code>int ms_lineSize;</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>Class member</td><td><code>int m_lineSize;</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>Global variable</td><td><code>int g_lineSize;</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>Function or method parameter</td><td><code>int _lineSize;</code></td></tr>
<tr><td>Macros</td><td><code>#define INTERNAL_CHECK</code></td></tr>
</tbody>
</table>
